• {{employee.name}} {{employee.id}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-detail', templateUrl: './employee-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-detail.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeDetailComponent { public employees: any[] = []; constructor(private _employeeService : EmployeeService){ }; ngOnInit(){this._employeeService.getEmployee().subscribe(data => this.employees = data)}; }
